name: Ferocious Avocados 2: OPEN BETA!
description:
The sequel to the Avocado-murdering game of the century, Ferocious Avocados 2!                                      (This sequel is very early into development, so don't expect a lot.)

The full game is planned to release some time 2025 (emphasis on "planned to") and would have 20 levels! a bit over 3 times as much as the first game! I hope you enjoy the beta!
